action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 22 - 18.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Ways and Means. H. Rept. 116-160.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 119.

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services

bill.summary:
Child Care Quality and Access Act of 2019
This bill extends through FY2021, and increases funding for, the Child Care Entitlement grant program under the Temporary Assistance for Needy Families (TANF) program.
